long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Suika Game, also known as the Watermelon Game, is a highly addictive puzzle game available as a Chrome extension and for free on the website suikagame.me. Developed by Aladdin X, this game has captivated players of all ages with its unique gameplay and challenging levels. The objective is to drop and stack various fruits into a box, causing them to roll and merge when they come into contact with each other. The larger the fruit, the more points it earns. Careful planning is crucial to prevent the fruits from overflowing the box and ending the game. With its simple concept, no time limit, and exciting chain reactions, Suika Game offers endless fun and entertainment. Try it out and see how high of a score you can achieve in this addictive watermelon puzzle game!
If you want play more games please click on "Unblocked Games, Suika Game Online" and click on web version for play on our website https://suikagame.ee/ Thanks!
